description: The `v-checkbox-btn` component is a lightweight alternative to the `v-checkbox` component that is designed to be used inside of `v-data-table`to select rows or display inline boolean data.

props.indeterminate: Puts the control in an indeterminate state. Used with the [indeterminate-icon](#props-indeterminate-icon) property.
props.indeterminateIcon: Icon used when the component is in an indeterminate state.

events.update:indeterminate: Event that is emitted when the component's indeterminate state changes.
